name: War Conditioning
summary: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.
description:
You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily. When you gain this feat, you can choose to gain either a climb Speed of 20 feet or a swim Speed of 20 feet.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
